title: Quarkus Profile doesn't work

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I have [application.properties]aving different profiles configured , eg : %windows.quarkus.http.ssl.certificate .... = ${CSPKI_WEB_CERT} and other profile as %ci.quarkus.http.ssl.certificate.... = src/main/resources/certs/cert.p12 . When I run CI build with this - maven(command: '-B -Dquarkus.profile= ci clean deploy) , Jenkin is reading even the windows profile configuration, And yes I have provided my default profile as windows.

### Expected behavior

It should pick active profile which is set and not read all properties mentioned in application.properties.

### Actual behavior

Currently it reads all the profiles mentioned in application.properties file.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11.0.15

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

1.21.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
